modName: Steel Arrow Retexture - Black and White Feathers

descriptionHtml:
This is Just a re-texture of the Steel Arrows I did for myself, and decided to share it here on the Nexus. It replaces the texture (duh, =P), and normal map of the steel arrows.

Installation: Just unzip to desktop, open file, and copy and paste into "C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim" folder. Not sure how that would work with NMM because I don't use that, or any other mod manager.

Credit: Thanks to Bethesda for the textures this mod is based off of, and for Skyrim and their efforts in supporting the creativity of the Skyrim modding community.

Permission: I only ask that if you choose to use these textures in another mod that you give credit where credit is due.
author: Mythos214
